p: We have previously characterised the nutraceutical, antioxidant and cytoprotective activity of pistachio ( Pistacia vera L., variety Bronte) hulls extracts: they are rich in phenols, including flavonols, phenolic acid, and flavan-3-ols, and anthocyanins, such as cyanidyn-3- O-galactoside [ 7, 8]. Furthermore, the antimicrobial activity of the EO from pistachio hulls against Gram-positive and Gram-negative strains, both American Type Culture Collection (ATCC) and clinical isolates, was investigated [ 9].
